name: Zaloop Game
description:
Zaloop Game Synopsis:

The story of how a simple guy wanted to become a professional detective. He is an intern. He is doing an internship at a hotel where a person went missing. His task is to find everything that will help in the search for a person.

Zaloop Game - first-person horror game with elements of search for objects and solving puzzles.

Tagline:

«No exit»

Features:

- Beautiful graphics.
- The atmosphere of fear and horror.
- A few endings.
- Beautiful visual effects.
- High-quality sound component.
- Integration of achievements and leaderboards.

Input:

[WASD] - Control the Player
[E/LMB/Enter] - Interact with Object
[RMB] - Zoom
[F] - Flashlight
[I] - Inventory
[Q] - UV Light
[Shift] - Run
[Space] - Jump

System Requirements:

OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 (32 and 64-Bit)
Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 | AMD Radeon HD 7700
DirectX: Version 9.0 | 11.0
Storage: 1 GB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360/Keyboard
